name: Widget Music Chart
author: Mr. Meo

sections.description:
Widget Music Chart allows you to show charts from billboard.com or officialcharts.com

Supported charts:
– billboard hot 100
– billboard 200
– billboard artist 100
– uk single top 100
– uk album top 100
– keep adding…

If you want any chart, just tell me.

This plugin doens’t work anymore

I no longer develope this plugin. Stop using it.

Override support

You can create layout on ‘layouts’ folder, or create new layout at your theme at directory

[theme_directory] / widget-music-chart / layout.php

Then pick layout you want at widget setting

Demo: Link

Like my work?

By me a coffee
